name: SeleniumWebdriverInstaller
description: Acquires and caches WebDriver for various browsers to run Selenium tests.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: chromeDriver
inputs.label: Chrome Driver
inputs.helpMarkDown: Acquires the WebDriver for Chrome from here. The driver can be referenced using the environment variable ChromeWebDriver.

inputs.name: chromeDriverVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a supported version from here. Use the same semantic format as mentioned in the list.
